Meta.Name: Get_ProjectIDList_for_ActiveUser_and_RightPackageList
Meta.Description: Retrieves project id list for user and rights

CodeGen.SQLStatement: Select tms_pro_projects.TMS_PRO_ProjectID AS Project_ID From tms_pro_projects Left Join tms_pro_projectmembers On tms_pro_projects.TMS_PRO_ProjectID = tms_pro_projectmembers.Project_RefID Inner Join tms_pro_members_2_rightpackage On tms_pro_projectmembers.TMS_PRO_ProjectMemberID = tms_pro_members_2_rightpackage.ProjectMember_RefID Where tms_pro_members_2_rightpackage.IsDeleted = 0 And tms_pro_projectmembers.USR_Account_RefID = @AccountID And tms_pro_members_2_rightpackage.ACC_RightsPackage_RefID = @RightPackIDList And tms_pro_projects.IsArchived = @IsArchived And tms_pro_projects.IsDeleted = 0 And tms_pro_projects.Tenant_RefID = @TenantID And tms_pro_projectmembers.IsDeleted = 0
